email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Linda,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the MV OCEANIC HARMONY, which has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is Nov 15-20, and the starting freight quote is USD 25/mt. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Linda Choi

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Linda,

Thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the rate seems a bit high. Market rates are around USD 22/mt. Can you adjust the quote?

Best regards,
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

I understand your concern. Given the current market conditions, I can revise the freight quote to USD 23/mt. The vessel is in excellent condition and has a proven track record in this route. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best,
Linda Choi

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Linda,

USD 23/mt works for us. Please proceed with the booking and send the contract details. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Great! The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. I will send the contract details within the next hour.

Best,
Linda Choi
